You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &ifr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ifr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2111/index.htm U+02111].
  * `&ifr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D526.
